item.title: Self-Study in August 2019
item.description: List the local NPM link packages npm ls -g –depth=0 –link=true Tags: npm, npm-link, node, link, global-dependency Id: c01a0efa-b832-11e9-87be-0242ac110003 Read: Tue, 06 Aug 2019 10:12:52 +0000 Mutation testing tool for java / jvm This is a mutation testing tool for the JVM / java Tags: pitest, pit, mutation-testing, testing, test, tool, jvm, java, mutation Id: 02d29d3e-b833-11e9-b785-0242ac110003 Read: Tue, 06 Aug 2019 10:14:44 +0000 Ugly trivia kata, using mutation testing This is a kata I’ve practiced, then shown at the Software Crafters meetup (at Softonic).

item.title: Self-Study in July 2019
item.description: How I use reveal.js This author explains how they use reveal.js. The online editor (slides.com). The author uses plain html for storing the slides.
